trans-unit.source: Provides Internet Protocol (IP) statistical data for an network interface on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 提供针对本地计算机上的网络接口的 Internet 协议 (IP) 统计数据。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPStatistics%2A> method to return network traffic information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPStatistics%2A>方法以返回接口的网络流量信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceStatistics" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceStatistics" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceStatistics>.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可以调用仅由派生自的类<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceStatistics>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上接收到的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上接收的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上发送的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上发送的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 获取丢弃的传入数据包个数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of incoming packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 已丢弃的传入数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 此数据不包括有错误的数据包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取有错误的传入数据包数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of incoming packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 有错误的传入数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets without errors that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 此数据不包括未出现错误而被丢弃的数据包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of incoming packets with an unknown protocol that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取在接口上接收的使用未知协议的传入数据包的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of incoming packets with an unknown protocol that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上接收的带有未知协议的传入数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: This data reflects packets that were discarded because the protocol identifier in the packet header was not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 此数据将反映已被丢弃，因为无法识别数据包标头中的协议标识符的数据包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of non-unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上接收到的非单播数据包个数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of incoming non-unicast packets received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上接收的传入非单播数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用单播地址的数据包发送到单个接口。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非单播地址的数据包可以传递到多个接口。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 广播，任意广播和多播的地址是类型的非单播地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of non-unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上发送的非单播数据包个数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of non-unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上发送的非单播数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用单播地址的数据包发送到单个接口。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非单播地址的数据包可以传递到多个接口。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 广播，任意广播和多播的地址是类型的非单播地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of outgoing packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 获取丢弃的传出数据包数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of outgoing packets that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 已丢弃的传出数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 此数据不包括有错误的传出数据包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取有错误的传出数据包数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of outgoing packets with errors.
trans-unit.target: 有错误的传出数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: This data does not include packets without errors that were discarded.
trans-unit.target: 此数据不包括未出现错误而被丢弃的数据包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the output queue.
trans-unit.target: 获取输出队列的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of packets in the output queue.
trans-unit.target: 输出队列中的数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上接收到的单播数据包个数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of unicast packets that were received on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上接收的单播数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用单播地址的数据包发送到单个接口。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非单播地址的数据包可以传递到多个接口。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 广播，任意广播和多播的地址是类型的非单播地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取该接口上发送的单播数据包个数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The total number of unicast packets that were sent on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该接口上发送的单播数据包的总数。

trans-unit.source: Packets with unicast addresses are delivered to a single interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用单播地址的数据包发送到单个接口。

trans-unit.source: Packets with non-unicast addresses can be delivered to multiple interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 具有非单播地址的数据包可以传递到多个接口。

trans-unit.source: Anycast, broadcast, and multicast addresses are types of non-unicast addresses.
trans-unit.target: 广播，任意广播和多播的地址是类型的非单播地址。
